{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cobalt |model=RaQ |revision=2 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Quantum Effect Design |cpu1_model=RM5231 |cpu1_cspeed=250 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=AM29F040B-120JC |expansion_if_types=IDE, Ultra SCSI |serial=yes,, DE-9,, (115200,8,N,1), |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=21143-PD |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=LXT970AQC |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=21143-PD |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Integrated PCI System Controller;Galileo Technology;GT-64111-P-1;;1;,,, PCI Integrated Peripheral Controller;VIA Technologies;VT82C586A;;1;,,, PCI Ultra SCSI Controller;Symbios Logic;53C860;;1;,,, Very-High-Speed CMOS FPGA;QuickLogic;QL8X12B;;1;,,, UART w/32-Byte FIFO;EXAR Corporation;ST16C640A;;1;,,, |stock_boot=Cobalt Firmware;;;, |stock_os=Linux;2.4.22 |oui_eth=00:10:E0 }}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''Quantum Effect Design'' RM5231 @250MHz *RAM: 2x 72-pin 3.3V EDO SIMM slots for 16-256 MiB RAM *Storage: 2 ATA bus, 1 Ultra SCSI bus
